channel.title: Middlewares on Chao Yang

item.title: Get started with WebLogic
item.description: Concepts: Domain, Admin Server, Managed Server, Node Manager WebSphere WebLogic Profile Domain Node Agent Node Manager Admin Server Application Server Managed Server WebSphere has standalone version and Network Deploy version (ND). In ND version, there is a central management node and another application nodes. And the node agent is a communication bridge among the management unit.
